tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Az-Zariyat, Ayah 5?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: To have a clear understanding of things of importance, seriousness and sincerity are essential. They will accept the truth only when their wrong approach brings down upon them overwhelming punishment, from which there will be no escape

tafsirQuiz.question: Which important teaching is conveyed in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Almighty God has created this known world in such a manner that it has become the indicator of the coming unknown world. In other words, the world of the Hereafter is the double or duplicate of the present world

tafsirQuiz.question: According to the tafsir, what should we understand from this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Perfect reproduction of a part of a man’s existence may be experienced in this world. It implies that when one’s voice can be reproduced, it should be possible to reproduce one’s existence

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse primarily teach us?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: For a long time he preached to his people about the Unity of God and the Hereafter. In these verses that scene has been described in which angels came to Abraham in order to give him the good news of his having children in his old age

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: A pail when being filled with water sinks in water the moment it is full. One who reforms himself before the overflowing of the pail may save himself, but one who remains careless and negligent till the last moment faces destruction
